sentences.en: "His eyes were glassy?"— 'And dilated. They were watery.' — 'Thank you.'
sentences.cn: “他的眼神呆滞？”——“还双眼圆睁，泪汪汪的。”——“谢谢！”

sentences.en: "I'll see you onto the train." — "Thank you."
sentences.cn: “我送你上火车。”——“谢谢。”

sentences.en: "Thank you doctor," said the nurse with a simper.
sentences.cn: “谢谢你，医生，”护士傻笑着说。

sentences.en: "Thank you for the wonderful dinner." — "It's nothing," Sarah said.
sentences.cn: “谢谢你招待了这么美味的晚餐。”——“这没什么，”萨拉说。

sentences.en: "Thank you very much for speaking with us." — "Not at all."
sentences.cn: “非常感谢您能和我们交谈。”——“不客气。”

sentences.en: Dear Madam, Thank you for your interest in our Memorial Scheme.
sentences.cn: 尊敬的女士，感谢您对我们的纪念方案的关注。

sentences.en: For all this I have only you to thank.
sentences.cn: 这一切我都得感谢你才是。

sentences.en: I consider it my duty to write to you and thank you.
sentences.cn: 我认为写信向你表达谢意是我的责任。

sentences.en: I haven’t had a chance to thank him yet.
sentences.cn: 我还没有机会向他表示谢意。

sentences.en: I'll thank you not to interrupt me again.
sentences.cn: 请你别再打断我。

sentences.en: Thank God they're not on my manor any more.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，他们再也不在我的辖区里了。

sentences.en: thank goodness no one was badly injured.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，没人受重伤。

sentences.en: Thank you very much indeed, Doctor, I am extremely obliged to you.
sentences.cn: 大夫，太感谢您了，您真是我的大恩人。

sentences.en: The policeman smiled at her. "Pretty dog."— "Oh well, thank you."
sentences.cn: 警察冲她笑了笑，“这狗真漂亮。”——“哦，谢谢。”

sentences.en: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.cn: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

sentences.en: They accepted their certificates with words of thanks.
sentences.cn: 他们接过证书，同时表示了谢意。

sentences.en: We have lost everything, but thank God, our lives have been spared.
sentences.cn: 我们已经失去了一切，不过谢天谢地，总算是保住了性命。

sentences.en: We know where we can get it, thank you very much.
sentences.cn: 我们知道在哪儿能买到，谢谢。

sentences.en: We would like to thank them for their patience and understanding.
sentences.cn: 我们要感谢他们的耐心和理解。

sentences.en: Well, at any rate, let me thank you for all you did.
sentences.cn: 好吧，不管怎样，还是要感谢你所做的一切。

words.tran_cn: 不感谢的；忘恩的；不领情的

phrases.phrase: I will thank you to do something
phrases.tran_cn: （表责备、生气时的请求）拜托，请

phrases.phrase: thank goodness (或 God 或 heavens)

phrases.tran_cn: 感谢自己的好运气，自庆幸运

trans.tran_en: When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something
When you express your thanks to someone, you express your gratitude to them for something
to tell someone that you are pleased and grateful for something they have done, or to be polite about it
